titleStmt.title: The favorites chronicle
Chronique des favoris. English
titleStmt.author: Fancan, François Dorval-Langlois, sieur de, ca. 1576-1628.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed according to the French copie,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Fancan, François Dorval-Langlois, sieur de. Chronique des favoris.
There are two editions; B2v line 2 has (1) "beganne" or (2) "began".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
